timeline.message: Fix issues related to Joml vector conversion
Add utility functions for rectangle conversion to JomlUtil
Fix issues related to Joml rectangle conversion

replies.bodyText:

replies.bodyText: I had intelliJ clean up the imports btw. I think that's where the confusion comes from. The line simply got moved around.
